scenarios.query: I am allergic to nuts and tree nuts. Can you give me a Thai curry recipe free of nuts?

recipes.title: Recipe #2: Thai Coconut Curry with Shrimp and Vegetables

1. Allergens & Diet:
   - Identified allergen: Nuts and tree nuts
   - No other dietary restrictions or preferences mentioned

2. Recipe Differentiation:
   - Cooking method: Braising
   - Main protein/ingredient source: Shrimp
   - Flavor profile and texture: Spicy, creamy, and slightly sweet with a tender texture
   - Base seasonings and sauces: Thai red curry paste, coconut milk, and fish sauce
